Summary: Object looked like the head of safety pin very high in the sky travelling N-S
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around November 13th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother and I were in my backyard admiring some construction I was having done on the house when we both noticed a white shining object at a very high altitude almost straight overhead that did not seem to move like a plane and did not seem to drift like a balloon. It was on a constant trajectory travelling very slowly from the North west to the South east. I took several photos of it and and some video as well. In several of the photos I included my house for scale. We didn't lose sight of the object, but rather stopped looking as it was tiring to keep looking upwards.
